mapper.select: select org_organ_company_ref.actualbalance as actualBalance, org_organ_company_ref.lineofcredit as lineOfCredit, (org_organ_company_ref.actualbalance + org_organ_company_ref.lineofcredit + IFNULL(org_organ_company_ref.couponamount,0) - org_organ_company_ref.balance) as unBalanced, (select le_leasescompany.name from le_leasescompany where le_leasescompany.id = org_organ_company_ref.companyid) as name, org_organ_company_ref.companyid as companyId, org_organ_company_ref.organid as organId, org_organ_company_ref.balance as balance, IFNULL(org_organ_company_ref.couponamount,0) as couponamount from org_organ_company_ref where org_organ_company_ref.organid IN ( select organ.id from org_organ organ where organ.status = 1 and organ.creditcode = ( select org_organ.creditcode from org_organ where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = #{organId} ) and organ.customertype!=1 ) and org_organ_company_ref.status = 1 and (org_organ_company_ref.bindstate = 1 or (org_organ_company_ref.bindstate = 0 and org_organ_company_ref.actualbalance > 0)) order by org_organ_company_ref.actualbalance

select t.* from (select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rownum, org_organexpenses.*, (case org_organexpenses.type when '0' then '充值' when '1' then '提现' when '2' then '结算' end) as typeName, CONCAT((case org_organexpenses.type when '0' then '+' when '1' then (case org_organexpenses.operateresult when '0' then '-' when '1' then '+' end) when '2' then '-' end),org_organexpenses.amount) as amountVisual from org_organexpenses, (select @rownum := 0) r where org_organexpenses.organid = #{organId} and org_organexpenses.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId} and org_organexpenses.status = 1
and org_organexpenses.expensetime >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_organexpenses.expensetime < STR_TO_DATE(ADDDATE(#{endTime},1),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_organexpenses.type in (${type})
and org_organexpenses.type not in ('0','1','2')
order by org_organexpenses.expensetime desc) t
where t.rownum > #{iDisplayStart} and t.rownum <= (#{iDisplayStart} + #{iDisplayLength})

select t.* from (select (@rownum := @rownum + 1) as rownum,t1.* from (select org_organbill.*, (select le_leasescompany.shortname from le_leasescompany where le_leasescompany.id = org_organbill.leasescompanyid) as shortName, (case t2.billstate when '3' then '待核对' when '4' then '待支付' when '5' then '已退回' when '6' then '已付款' when '7' then '已付款' when '8' then '已作废' when 'A' then '免单' end) as billStateName from org_organbill, (select t1.billsid,t1.operationtime,t1.billstate from ( select org_organbillstate.billsid,org_organbillstate.operationtime,org_organbillstate.billstate from org_organbillstate where org_organbillstate.status = 1 order by org_organbillstate.operationtime desc ) t1 group by t1.billsid ) t2 where org_organbill.id = t2.billsid and org_organbill.organid IN ( select organ.id from org_organ organ where organ.status = 1 and organ.creditcode = ( select org_organ.creditcode from org_organ where org_organ.status = 1 and org_organ.id = #{organId} ) and organ.customertype!=1 ) and org_organbill.status = 1
and org_organbill.leasescompanyid = #{leasesCompanyId}
and org_organbill.createtime >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_organbill.createtime >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_organbill.createtime >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 6 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and org_organbill.createtime >= STR_TO_DATE(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 YEAR),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and (t2.billstate = '3' or t2.billstate = '4' or t2.billstate = '5' or t2.billstate = '6' or t2.billstate = '7' or t2.billstate = '8' or t2.billstate = 'A')
and (t2.billstate = '6' or t2.billstate = '7')
and t2.billstate = #{billState}
order by org_organbill.createtime desc ) t1, (select @rownum := 0) r ) t
where t.rownum > #{iDisplayStart} and t.rownum <= (#{iDisplayStart} + #{iDisplayLength})
